name: KOG #12 - Archfiends
author: dacey0304
notes: Archfiends are still very powerful but stringing together 5 wins on the bounce was very tough as they're bricky and  very weak to heroes , spell books and CC which is being played more because of amazons.  Tier 3 is deserved.
